Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Authorizes the village of Trumansburg to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to a certain police officer
Summary: Authorizes the village of Trumansburg to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Kevin R. Noterfonzo under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Kevin R. Noterfonzo to receive certain service credit under a twenty year retirement plan
